TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowInteropHelper extends System.Object

summary.span: 協助 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 和 Win32 程式碼之間的互通性。

span.span: Assists interoperation between Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and Win32 code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的成員可讓內部存取呼叫者[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]HWND 和父 HWND 的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。Members of this class allows the caller to have internal access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] HWND and the parent HWND of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] . 適當的安全性檢查都是透過這些成員。The proper security checks are performed by those members. 每當您需要根據 HWND 更特定的物件時，請使用這個類別。Use this class whenever you need a more specific object based on its HWND. 如果您要裝載即為一例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]對話方塊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]應用程式。An example scenario is if you need to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application. 初始化與[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]對話方塊視窗物件。Initialize the with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window object for the dialog box. 您可以取得[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]視窗的控制代碼 (HWND) 與屬性和指定的擁有人[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]視窗屬性。You can then get the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window's handle (HWND) from the property and specify the owner for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window with the property. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用裝載時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]對話方塊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]應用程式。The following code example shows how to use when hosting a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application. [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#windowinterophelper)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#windowinterophelper)] 這個類別支援的另一種情況，是取得物件從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]物件。Another scenario supported by this class is to obtain a object from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] object. 可讓您直接處理[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]訊息透過方法。The enables direct processing of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] messages through the method. 使用和取代您仍然可以處理不對應或處理中的訊息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。By using and in place of a you can still handle messages that have no equivalent or handling in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 建立與來源，然後呼叫上從 HWND 取得。Create a with the source, then call on the to get from HWND to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

summary.span: 針對指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 視窗，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視窗可以是對話方塊中或視窗，否則會不適合用來裝載界限內[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]應用程式。The window can be a dialog box, or a window that is otherwise not suitable for being hosted within the bounds of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int EnsureHandle() cil managed

summary.span: 如果尚未建立視窗的 HWND，則會建立該 HWND。

span.span: Creates the HWND of the window if the HWND has not been created yet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，當您想要分隔實際顯示的受管理的視窗控制代碼 (HWND) 建立。Use the method when you want to separate window handle (HWND) creation from the actual showing of the managed . 當您有可以完成其工作，而不需要顯示視窗的自動化用戶端時，這非常有用。This is useful when you have an automation client that can accomplish its tasks without the need for showing a window. 如果尚未建立原生視窗，這個方法會建立原生視窗中，設定屬性，並傳回 HWND。If the native window has not yet been created, this method creates the native window, sets the property, and returns the HWND. 如果已經建立原生視窗，則會傳回現有的原生視窗的控制代碼。If the native window has been created already, the handle of the existing native window is returned. 如果因為呼叫這個方法，建立原生視窗就會引發事件。If the native window is created as a result of calling this method, the event is raised. 查詢屬性之後方法呼叫會傳回現有的視窗控制代碼。Querying the property after the method is called returns the existing window handle. 視覺化樹狀結構未連接至後直到視窗方法呼叫。The visual tree is not attached to the window until after the method is called. 呼叫方法超過一次並不會建立新的視窗控制代碼。Calling the method more than one time does not create new window handles. 呼叫方法的呼叫已建立之控制代碼時方法不會建立新的視窗控制代碼。Calling the method when the handle has already been created by a call to the method does not create a new window handle. 當沒有控制代碼存在時，才會建立原生視窗時方法呼叫。A native window is only created when no handle exists when the method is called. 視窗屬性所設定使用原生視窗應用程式開發介面，透過 p/invoke 可能不會出現在受管理的應用程式開發介面視窗。Window properties that are set by using native window APIs via p/invoke may not appear in the managed window APIs. 例如，如果您將使用後的原生 MS_EX_TOPMOST 旗標是最上層視窗設定呼叫方法時，屬性不一定會反映原始設定。For example, if you set the window to be topmost by using the native MS_EX_TOPMOST flag after the method is called, the property is not guaranteed to reflect the native setting.

permission.span: 建立及存取的視窗控制代碼。

span.span: to create and access a window handle.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 取得 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 視窗的視窗控制代碼，此控制代碼用於建立這個 。

span.span: Gets the window handle for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window that is used to create this .

permission.span: 若要取得的視窗控制代碼。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property IntPtr Owner { IntPtr get(); void set(IntPtr value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 主控視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the handle of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] owner window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重設 windows 藉由設定這個屬性中的父代。You can reparent windows by setting this property. True 會對一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]程式設計，請勿不重設父代已經在使用中的 windows。As is true for general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] programming, do not reparent windows that are already in use.

permission.span: 若要取得或設定這個屬性值。

span.span: to get or set this property value.
